name: Car Parking - Driving Academy
description:
Top of the line Exotic Sports cars! Claim Your Driving License Now!
Show your precision driving and smooth car parking skills in this realistic Car Parking game. An amazing, physics based car parking simulator game, Car Parking - Driving Academy is fun and challenging.
Car Parking - Driving Academy has some of the best Sports Cars and Luxury Cars that are fast, furious and agile! Upgrade your car so it is more powerful and can sustain car crashes.
Get into the driving seat of your favourite car, put your car in gear and accelerate to move forward. Can you clear each test without crashing?
This physics based, Car Parking - Driving Academy game will test your parking abilities and your car steering skills! Navigate your car with the utmost precision, through the parking lot to your destined parking spot. Reverse parking makes the Car Parking - Driving Academy even more challenging & exciting!
Manoeuvre your car between small spaces, realistic traffic, a busy parking lot and many other obstacles, to park without crashing. Be careful you don’t crash or you will fail the level.
To make Car Parking - Driving Academy, more exciting, we have two play modes for you to select from. Select the more relaxed Free Ride Mode or race against the clock in the Timed Mode.
You can also select the difficulty level in Car Parking - Driving Academy. Play the Rookie difficulty mode or challenge yourself in the Professional difficulty mode.
FEATURES
Exciting achievements
Huge parking lot, with beautiful shiny cars parked
Manoeuvre your car between various obstacles
Smooth and realistic handling
Realistic game sounds
Many shiny cars to choose from
Easy to learn and drive
Stunning 3D graphics
